title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add tomato puree and spices. Mix in cream and paneer. Simmer and serve.

title: Chole Bhature
instructions: Cook chickpeas with spices. Make dough with flour and yogurt. Deep fry bhature and serve with chole.

title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Ferment rice and dal batter. Cook potato masala. Make dosa on tawa, stuff with masala and fold.

title: Lauki Halwa
instructions: Cook lauki with cream, green chili, bay leaf, add spices, and simmer until done.

title: Urad Dal Kheer
instructions: Cook urad dal with clove, rice, spinach, add spices, and simmer until done.

title: Urad Dal Curry
instructions: Cook urad dal with coriander, jeera, jaggery, add spices, and simmer until done.

title: Gajar Curry
instructions: Cook gajar with jaggery, wheat flour, black pepper, add spices, and simmer until done.

title: Lauki Gravy
instructions: Cook lauki with coriander, mustard seeds, peas, add spices, and simmer until done.

title: Bhindi Masala
instructions: Cook bhindi with cinnamon, jeera, peas, add spices, and simmer until done.

title: Moong Dal Paratha
instructions: Cook moong dal with jaggery, mustard seeds, tamarind, add spices, and simmer until done.
